content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt, I'm impressed by your interest in my apartment, Mr. Wang. However, as I aim to gain the highest profit from this rental, let's begin the negotiation on a slightly higher price than market standards. How does 1200 Euro per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment, even considering its central location. I was thinking more in the range of 750 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly undervalues the location and apartment qualities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I believe 900 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: After considering your offer, I agree to the price of 950 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
